answers.answer: Feel free to use more than 8 words in your post.With the limited information you gave us here's what I suggest; get educated on how to control and manage your diabetic glucose [blood sugar] levels. Use Google search, ask your doctor for referrals to diabetes classes, ask your local hospital if they offer classes. Eat a diabetes diet/nutrition and exercise 30 minutes daily to help lower your glucose levels. If overweight by a few pounds/kilograms, you must lose the excess fat.
